Martial Adept: Has the Combat Superiority feature with 2 maneuvers and 1 die

Weapon Master: Weapon Proficiency (Choose 4 from any Simple Weapon, any Martial Weapon)

Dual Wielder: +1 Armor Class when wielding two melee weapons/Can use two-weapon fighting with any one-handed weapons/Can draw or stow two weapons simultaneously
Storm's Fury: Can use a reaction to inflict 20 HP lightning and a 20' push on a successful melee attacker (save DC 17 Strength HP only)

Magic
Spell Slots: S0: 6; S1: 4; S2: 3; S3: 3; S4: 3; S5: 3; S6: 2; S7: 2; S8: 1; S9: 1 Attack: S: 9 Spell DC: S: 17
Spells:
Blade Ward (S0 Abju): Self gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing weapon damage for 1 rd
Burning Hands (S1 Evoc): 15' cone inflicts 3d6 HP fire (save Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Chromatic Orb (S1 Evoc): R90' Ranged spell inflicts 3d8 HP of a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Cone Of Cold (S5 Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (save Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Confusion (S4 Ench): R90' Creatures in a 10' radius randomly: 10% wander; 50% do nothing; 20% attack an adjacent creature; 20% act normally (save Wisdom negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level increases the radius by 5']
Creation (S5 Illu): R30' Creates a 5' cube of false matter lasting up to 1 day [+Level creates a +5' cube]
Crown Of Madness (S2 Ench): R120' Self can direct the target's attacks each rd (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Darkvision (S2 Tran): Willing touched sees 60' in darkness for 8 hr
Disintegrate (S6 Tran): R60' Inflicts 10d6+40 HP force and turns the target to dust if reduced to 0 HP (save Dexterity negates), or disintegrates a Large or smaller object or magical force [+Level inflicts +3d6 HP]
Dominate Beast (S4 Ench): R60' Target beast obeys telepathic commands (save Wisdom negates; damage allows another save) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level extends the duration to 10 min, 1 hr, or 8 hr at level 5, 6, or 7]
Dominate Person (S5 Ench): R60' Target humanoid obeys telepathic commands (save Wisdom negates; damage allows another save) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level extends the duration to 10 min, 1 hr, or 8 hr at level 6, 7, or 8]
Fire Storm (S7 Evoc): R150' 10 connected 10' cubes inflict 7d10 HP fire (save Dexterity half) and ignite unattended flammable objects
Friends (S0 Ench): Self gains advantage on Charisma checks with a non-hostile target for concentration up to 1 min; the target becomes hostile afterward
Greater Invisibility (S4 Illu): Touched becomes invisible for concentration up to 1 min
Incendiary Cloud (S8 Conj): R150' 20' radius inflicts 10d8 HP fire (save Dexterity half), obscures, and moves away 10' per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Mage Armor (S1 Abju): Willing, unarmored touched gains AC 13 + Dexterity modifier for 8 hr; the spell ends if the target dons armor
Major Image (S3 Illu): R120' Creates a 20' cube sight, sound, and touch illusion (Investigation detects) for concentration up to 10 min [+Level extends the duration to permanent at level 6]
Message (S0 Tran): R120' Self and target can hold a whispered conversation for 1 rd
Move Earth (S6 Tran): R120' Reshapes a 40' cube of earth each 10 minutes for concentration up to 2 hr
Plane Shift (S7 Conj): Target (save Charisma negates) or self and 8 willing others travel to another plane
Poison Spray (S0 Conj): R10' Inflicts 4d12 HP poison (save Constitution negates)
Prestidigitation (S0 Tran): R10' Creates minor magic effects for 1 hr
Protection From Energy (S3 Abju): Touched gains resistance to a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Scorching Ray (S2 Evoc): R120' 3 ranged attacks inflict 2d6 HP fire each [+Level gives +1 ranged attack]
Shield (S1 Abju): Reaction gives +5 AC and immunity to Magic Missile until the next turn
Shocking Grasp (S0 Evoc): Touched suffers 4d8 HP lightning and loss of reactions until its next turn
Sleet Storm (S3 Conj): R150' 40' radius douses flames and inflicts difficult terrain and falling prone (save Dexterity negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Time Stop (S9 Tran): Self can take 1d4+1 turns while no time passes for others; affecting another creature or moving more than 1000' away ends
Magic Notes:
Elemental Adept (Cold): Spells that inflict cold damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Elemental Adept (Fire): Spells that inflict fire damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Font Of Magic: Can use 20 Sorcery Points per long rest/Can use a bonus action to convert between Sorcery Points and spell slots
Heart Of The Storm: 10' radius inflicts 10 HP of a choice of lightning or thunder on targets when casting a lightning or thunder spell
Sorcerous Restoration: Taking a short rest restores 4 Sorcery Points
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the sorcerer spell list
Storm Guide: Can use an action to stop rain in a 20' radius and a bonus action each rd to direct winds in a 100' radius
Tempestuous Magic: Can use a bonus action before or after casting a spell to fly 10' without provoking opportunity attacks
Wind Soul: R30' Can slow fly Speed to 30' to give 6 others a 30' fly Speed for 1 hr once per long rest
Notes
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 7 available vs. 1 allocated
